text: (kolaiyai) allah vilakkiyirukka ninkal enta manitanaiyum niyayamana karanaminrik kolai ceytu vitatirkal; evarenum aniyayamakak kolai ceyyappattu vittal, avarutaiya varicukku (patilukku patil ceyyavo allatu mannikkavo) nam atikaram kotuttirukkirom; anal kolaiyi(n mulam patil ceyvati)l varampu katantu vitak kutatu niccayamaka kolaiyuntavarin varicu (nitiyaik kontu) utavi ceyyap pattavaravar
